level.heading: Chimney limitations and tests.
level.text: § 27-863.01 Chimney limitations and tests. No solid fuel fireplace, fireplace stove or room heater shall be installed or altered unless connected to a chimney which complies with the limitations and testing requirements set forth in table 15-6.1.
